prod.full_name: adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Mineral Blue
prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Adidas/Yeezy/Foam RNNR/Adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Mineral Blue
prod.desciption:
DISCLAIMER: US and UK sizing is the same and does not require any conversion.

The adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Mineral Blue is made of a Mineral Blue foam that blends EVA with harvested algae. Oval cut-outs throughout the upper add ventilation to finish off the design.

The adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR Mineral Blue released in May of 2021 and retailed for $75.
